panels.description: It includes all pods that belong to this project constellation, including those that did not pass the readiness check
panels.title: Total number of pods in $namespace

panels.description: It contains the total number of pods that pass the readiness check. If there are differences between total pods and this number then some pods are not ready.
panels.title: Total pods that passes readiness check

panels.description: Total count of pods that are being scrapped successfully by prometheus
panels.title: Total pods being scrapped successfully by Prometheus

panels.description: Some pods in the project logging error or warning messages. Please check the logs.
panels.title: Logging error or warning exists?

panels.description: Some pods in the project are giving rest error responses. Please check the details.
panels.title: Rest error calls exists?

panels.description: Compares the CPU Usage to CPU request and limit. Ideally, in a development environment, your usage should be close to the request.
panels.title: Total CPU usage vs CPU request and limit in $namespace

panels.description: It compares the total memory usage vs total memory request for the project over a period of time
panels.title: Total Project Memory Usage vs Memory Request and Limit

panels.description: If pods are not up for scrapping, then detail measurements will not be available in the dashboard
panels.title: Pods being available in prometheus target list for $app

panels.description: Please note that this is only available for the pods that are up for scrapping from Prometheus perspective
panels.title: Response Time for the pods in $app

panels.description: Please note this is available only for the pods that are 'up' for scrapping from Prometheus perspective
panels.title: Request Rate for the pods in $app

panels.description: Compares the CPU Usage to CPU request and limit for pod. Ideally, in a development environment, your usage should be close to the request.
panels.title: CPU usage vs CPU request and limit for POD-  $pod

panels.description: Compares the total memory usage of a pod with memory request and limit
panels.title: Memory usage vs limit and request for POD - $pod

panels.description: A breakdown of total CPU time in user time and system time
panels.title: CPU Usage breakdown

panels.description: Tells whether the pod is scrappable by Prometheus. If it is not scrapable only minimum information is available about the pod through the Kubernetes environment.
panels.title: POD - $pod is UP

panels.description: relates from the used memory how much is dedicated to JVM heap and non-heap. It is currently accurate for Springboot applications.

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name="$pod"}) or sum(jvm_memory_bytes_used{area="nonheap", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name="$pod"})

sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="heap", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name="$pod"}) or sum(jvm_memory_bytes_used{area="heap", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", kubernetes_pod_name="$pod"})

targets.legendFormat: Total memory usage for the Pod

panels.title: JVM Memory breakdown for POD - $pod

panels.description: Total time spent in GC related activities for  this pod. This is a rate.
panels.title: Time Spent rate in GC for POD - $pod

panels.description: Gives a glimpse at the garbage collection rate of the pod.
panels.title: Garbage Collection Rate for POD - $pod

panels.description: If pods are not up for scrapping, then measurements will not be available in the dashboard
panels.title: Prometheus targets

panels.description: One can see the error logging rate of pods. Only for the pods that are scraped by Prometheus
panels.title: Log4j Error logging rate (/sec)

panels.description: Error rate over a configurable amount of time. These metrics only available for pods that are scraped by Prometheus
panels.title: Rest calls - Error rate (/sec)

panels.description: This panel is to compare the how high are the garbage collection rate for all the pods. This is currently accurate for only pods that are scrapped successfully by Prometheus.
panels.title: Garbage collection rate for all pods up for scrapping

panels.description: This panel compares the memory usage of all the pods in the project
panels.title: Memory usage across all pods
